snippet: Unsealed court documents made public by a federal judge who is overseeing thousands of lawsuits filed by patients and their families who say that Pradaxa’s manufacturer failed to properly warn them about the risks of taking the drug.
lead_paragraph: Unsealed court documents made public by a federal judge who is overseeing thousands of lawsuits filed by patients and their families who say that Pradaxa’s manufacturer failed to properly warn them about the risks of taking the drug.

headline.main: Unsealed Court Documents in Pradaxa Case
